title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.1 - Qualifications to start
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.1 - Qualifications to start

State Regulations
A horse shall not be qualified to start in any race
unless, not less than 30 minutes before the time set for the race his presence
on the grounds of the association be reported to the paddock judge, he be
announced to the clerk of the scales as a starter, and the name of his jockey
given to the latter official. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4222.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
